Global Network

  • First Overseas AI Centerby a Domestic Financial Institution Hanwha AI Center (San Francisco)

    • Established: December 2024
    • Jointly established by Hanwha Life Insurance, Hanwha General Insurance, and Hanwha Asset Management

  • Hanwha Asset Management USA.,Ltd. U.S. Subsidiary (San Francisco)

    • Established: June 2005
    • KRW 4 trillion in overseas bond discretionary mandates

  • Hanwha Asset Management (MENA) Ltd. UAE Subsidiary

    • Established: July 2025
    • Launched private Middle East-focused private equity funds and conducted local investor marketing to expand influence across the MENA (Middle East and North Africa) region

  • Hanwha Asset Management Pte., Ltd. Singapore Subsidiary

    • Established: October 2014
    • Launched Hanwha Korea Enhanced Yield Bond Strategy Fund in 2025

  • Hanwha Asset Management Co., Ltd. Headquarters (Seoul)

    • Established: 1988

    Established
    2005
    Key Product
    VC 2025 Next Generation Opportunity Fund
    Key Focus
    • Developed-market bond investments centered on North American hubs
    • Alternative investment strategies targeting next-generation industries
    History
    • Jun. 2025: Established / Feb. 2017: Acquired
    • Enhanced competitiveness in locally managed overseas bond investments focused on developed markets
    • 2022: Relocated headquarters to San Francisco; opened New York branch
    • 2023: Launched first alternative investment fund in the Americas

    Established
    2014
    Key Product
    Hanwha Enhanced Yield Bond Strategy Fund
    Key Focus
    • Investments and advisory services centered on high-growth Asian markets
    History
    • Oct. 2024: Established
    • Identified investment opportunities in alternative investment areas across Asia
